error.actions: You can take a <1>Try again</1> or <3><0>Report</0></3> the issue.

inject.load-script: Load a <script> in the testing project;
inject.pass-config: The configuration you passed will override the default value;
inject.start-debug: Start debugging by clicking the <1>Connections</1> menu at the top!

banner.title:
All-In-One
Remote Debugging Tool
banner.desc: Debug remotely and easily with a range of features like chrome devtool.

error-trace.title: Error detail
error-trace.failed-title: There are some issues with locating the source code
error-trace.failed-advice: Here are some suggestions to fix and improve the situation:
error-trace.fix-suggestion-1: <0>1. Ensure file existence: When locating the source code for each error stack, two files need to be requested - the compressed file and the sourcemap file. The rule for obtaining the sourcemap file is based on the address indicated by</0> <1>//# sourceMappingURL=*</1> <2>in the contents of the compressed file;</2>
error-trace.fix-suggestion-2: 2. Troubleshoot network issues: If there are access restrictions on the server where your source files are located, it may lead to failed requests when trying to access the resources. You can open the devtool to check if the network is working properly.

storage.empty-detail: Select one to preview its value

socket.client-not-in-connection: No client in the current connection
socket.client-fail: Client has lost the connection, please contact the relevant tester.
socket.reconnect-fail-desc: Reconnect failed, you have lost the connection. Please refresh the page or select another.
